languages.translation_comment:
стартует этюд "MercyForTheSuffering
после куя игрок бьет/стреляет в парня, тот падает

languages.text: "Не надо! Смилуйтесь!.." {n}В глазах юноши вспыхивает ужас, но, увидев спокойствие на вашем лице, он сникает и смиренно опускает голову.{/n} "Да будет... так. Я больше... не вынесу этой боли... Лучше... умереть".
languages.translation_comment:
стартует этюд "MercyForTheSuffering
после куя игрок бьет/стреляет в парня, тот падает

languages.text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."
languages.original_text: "Не надо! Смилуйтесь!.." {n}В глазах юноши вспыхивает ужас, но, увидев спокойствие на вашем лице, он сникает и смиренно опускает голову.{/n} "Да будет... так. Я больше... не вынесу этой боли... Лучше... умереть".

traits.locale_text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

"No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

"No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather go... to the Undying One..."

"No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather go... to the Undying One..."

"No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

"No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

languages.text: « Non ! Pitié... » {n}D'abord horrifié, l'homme s'apaise en remarquant le calme de votre expression. Il semble abandonner toute peur et penche la tête, résigné.{/n} « Qu'il en soit ainsi... Je ne veux plus... souffrir ainsi... Je préfère... mourir... »
languages.original_text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

traits.locale_text: « Non ! Pitié... » {n}D'abord horrifié, l'homme s'apaise en remarquant le calme de votre expression. Il semble abandonner toute peur et penche la tête, résigné.{/n} « Qu'il en soit ainsi... Je ne veux plus... souffrir ainsi... Je préfère... mourir... »

languages.text: «¡No! Piedad...». {n}El horror atraviesa el rostro del hombre, pero al ver tu expresión tranquila, deja atrás su miedo y agacha resignado la cabeza.{/n} «Que así sea... No puedo... soportar el dolor... Prefiero... morir...».
languages.original_text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

traits.locale_text: «¡No! Piedad...». {n}El horror atraviesa el rostro del hombre, pero al ver tu expresión tranquila, deja atrás su miedo y agacha resignado la cabeza.{/n} «Que así sea... No puedo... soportar el dolor... Prefiero... morir...».

languages.text: 「いやだ！お慈悲を…」{n}男の目に恐怖が見え隠れしたが、こちらの落ち着いた表情を見て恐怖を捨て、諦めて頭を下げた。{/n}「どうぞ、お好きに…私は、もう…この痛みに、耐えられない…いっそ…死ぬ…」
languages.original_text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

traits.locale_text: 「いやだ！お慈悲を…」{n}男の目に恐怖が見え隠れしたが、こちらの落ち着いた表情を見て恐怖を捨て、諦めて頭を下げた。{/n}「どうぞ、お好きに…私は、もう…この痛みに、耐えられない…いっそ…死ぬ…」

languages.text: “不！求求你……”{n}男人眼中闪过一丝恐惧，但当他看到你平静的表情之后，他放下了心中的恐惧，顺从地低下了头。{/n}“就这样吧……我再也受不了……这样的痛苦了……我宁可……去死……”
languages.original_text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

traits.locale_text: “不！求求你……”{n}男人眼中闪过一丝恐惧，但当他看到你平静的表情之后，他放下了心中的恐惧，顺从地低下了头。{/n}“就这样吧……我再也受不了……这样的痛苦了……我宁可……去死……”

languages.text: "Nein! Gnade ..." {n}Entsetzen blitzt in den Augen des Mannes auf, aber als er deinen ruhigen Gesichtsausdruck sieht, schwindet die Angst, und er senkt resignieret den Kopf.{/n} "So sei es ... Ich ertrage ... diesen Schmerz nicht mehr ... Lieber … sterbe ich."
languages.original_text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."

traits.locale_text: "Nein! Gnade ..." {n}Entsetzen blitzt in den Augen des Mannes auf, aber als er deinen ruhigen Gesichtsausdruck sieht, schwindet die Angst, und er senkt resignieret den Kopf.{/n} "So sei es ... Ich ertrage ... diesen Schmerz nicht mehr ... Lieber … sterbe ich."

languages.text: "Hayır! Merhamet edin..." {n}Adamın gözlerinde dehşetin parıltısı çakıyor. Ancak sakin yüz ifadeni görmesiyle birlikte korkusundan kurtularak teslim olurcasına başını eğiyor.{/n} "Öyle olsun madem... Bu acıya... Daha fazla katlanamam... Ölsem... Daha iyi..."
languages.original_text: "No! Mercy..." {n}Horror flashes in the man's eyes, but once he sees your calm expression, he lets go of the fear and bows his head in resignation.{/n} "So be it... I can't... take this pain anymore... I'd rather... die..."
